item.description:
Trying to find a presentation or two for this month. Look for updates next week. Speak up if you have suggestions/ideas!


The agenda is:

1) Intro's for new folks
1.5) Jeremy Durham talks about MERB
2) General topic discussion
3) General hacking.
4) Food & Drink (optional...but I'm definitely up for a beer or some grub after the meeting...we could break early and go if everyone seems interested.)
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the loud guy with the beard. :P
item.why: We're a nice group of geeky folks who (so far) enjoy helping one another, solving problems and sharing our discoveries.
item.name: The Metrowest Ruby Users Group July Meetup
